content:
perfectly planned celebrations

The team will ensure your day is perfect for you both, offering you stress free planning of your dream day. You will arrive relaxed and able to enjoy your special day here in Cyprus.


To say “I DO” starts way before the ceremony and this is where our planning with you is meticulous and our service as individual as you are. This is the most important day of your life and Tsokkos weddings believe you deserve the best day ever.

Contact us
